general_advisory: As per extended range forecast received from IMD, light to moderate rain/thundershower is likely to occur...

advisory: Prevailing weather conditions are favorable for incidence of diseases like Bacterial Blight, Bacterial Leaf Streak, Leaf Blast, etc.
Control Gundhi Bug infestation if noticed during milking stage.
To control Ear cutting caterpillar, spray recommended pesticides at root zone.
For managing BPH infestation, undertake alternate wetting and drying technique.
Apply recommended chemicals to control American bollworm in Non-Bt cotton areas.
Use specified pesticides to control Bacterial leaf blight.
Spray recommended pesticides to control Leaf webber, Leaf folder, Defoliators.
Apply neem-based pesticides to control Pod borer at initial stage of infestation.
Apply specified pesticide to control American Cob Borer infestation.
For BLSB control, spray Validamycin 3.0% SL or Hexaconazole 5% EC.
Prepare nursery beds with specified measurements and apply recommended substances.
Use suitable varieties like Utkala Prgayan, Utkala Raja, Utkala Kumari, etc.
Prepare nursery beds with recommended substances prior to sowing.
Use suitable varieties for Cauliflower, Cabbage, and Broccoli.
Prepare nursery beds as specified and apply necessary substances.
Use suitable varieties like Agrifound light Red, Agrifound dark Red, Bhima Super, etc.
To control mealy bug infestation, spray specified chemicals.
Perform training, pruning, and intercultural operations for rose care.
To control Black spot, apply Copper Oxychloride 50% WP.
Deworm the cattle and buffalo regularly, and consult with veterinary doctors if needed.
Regularly check animals for dehydration, heat stress, and parasitic infections.
Use raised platforms and deep litter systems for cleanliness and temperature control in poultry houses.
Maintain appropriate stocking density to reduce stress and prevent overheating.
